review:
I delivered my child 17 years back at Dr.Shah's Ashwini Hospital ,Dadar (west) and had a hysterectomy last year. Dr.Vikram Shah performed the surgery.  
You feel  comfortable and safe in hands of Dr.Shah.
Thanks

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Vikram Shah is a very warm yet to-the-point kind of a doc and explains everything very patiently despite the huge queue of patients waiting outside to meet him. Simplicity is his biggest highlight! Despite the amount of work he does, he is always available to his patients. I would reccomend him anyone who has lost all hope. At times some positivity is all you instead of expensive treatments. Thank you Doc!!

Pleasant experience 
Adequate personalised care.... for my wife.. 
Patient and explains everything in detail.. 
Experienced and caring

You will have c section for C SECTION FOR sure. Everything will be fine will let month, suddenly some complications on the list month and they will advise for C section. ** ******** **** **** *** ****** ** ****** ******** *** **** ** * **** ** * ********

He is Dr , he will give you some filmy reason for that. Best luck. Paying reasonable amount for treatment ** ***** but being fooled cause Dr I'll advised suggestions is not ok.
You feel safe in the hands of Dr. Shah.  He gives you enough time and attention,

review: Excellent experience. Very friendly staff and doctors. All queries across the 9 months were resolved wenever required. Will definitely recommend.
